metadata.title: A Marine Mammal Ecosystem Model for the Bering Sea

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Mammal Laboratory (NMML)

metadata.description: To examine some of the relationships between marine mammals and fisheries in order to improve our understanding of how fisheries and mammals interact in the Bering Sea.
metadata.notes:
